languages.text: "Теперь, когда я увидел святое великое изваяние Императора, у меня осталась только одно желание. Ступить на землю Священного мира Амалике, скрытого в Цинерус Малефикум".
"Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, когда я увидел святое великое изваяние Императора, у меня осталась только одно желание. Ступить на землю Священного мира Амалике, скрытого в Цинерус Малефикум".

traits.locale_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."
"Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."
"Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."
"Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."
"Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

languages.text: “如今，我已经见到了帝皇的伟大圣像，我只剩下一个愿望了——前往苍灰恶咒，前往位于那里的神殿世界阿迈莱卡。”
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: “如今，我已经见到了帝皇的伟大圣像，我只剩下一个愿望了——前往苍灰恶咒，前往位于那里的神殿世界阿迈莱卡。”

languages.text: «Ahora que he contemplado la sagrada estatua del Emperador, solo me queda un deseo que cumplir: pisar el venerado mundo de Amalikeh, que se encuentra en el Cinerus Maleficum».
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que he contemplado la sagrada estatua del Emperador, solo me queda un deseo que cumplir: pisar el venerado mundo de Amalikeh, que se encuentra en el Cinerus Maleficum».

languages.text: 「皇帝の偉大な聖像を見た今、私に残された願いはただひとつ。サイネラス・マレフィカムのどこかにあると言われているアマリケの礼拝惑星を訪れてみたい」
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の偉大な聖像を見た今、私に残された願いはただひとつ。サイネラス・マレフィカムのどこかにあると言われているアマリケの礼拝惑星を訪れてみたい」

languages.text: "Da ich jetzt die große heilige Statue des Imperators gesehen habe, habe ich nur noch einen Wunsch. Ich möchte meinen Fuß auf die Schreinwelt Amalikeh setzen, die irgendwo im Cinerus Maleficum liegt."
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: "Da ich jetzt die große heilige Statue des Imperators gesehen habe, habe ich nur noch einen Wunsch. Ich möchte meinen Fuß auf die Schreinwelt Amalikeh setzen, die irgendwo im Cinerus Maleficum liegt."

languages.text: « Maintenant que j'ai pu admirer la grande statue sacrée de l'Empereur, je n'ai plus qu'un dernier souhait : poser le pied sur le monde sanctuaire d'Amalikeh, dans le Cinerus Maleficum. »
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que j'ai pu admirer la grande statue sacrée de l'Empereur, je n'ai plus qu'un dernier souhait : poser le pied sur le monde sanctuaire d'Amalikeh, dans le Cinerus Maleficum. »

languages.text: "İmparator'un ulu, kutsal heykelini de görmüş oldum. Geriye tek bir arzum kaldı: Cinerus Maleficum'da bir yerlerde bulunan mabet dünya Amalikeh'ye ayak basmak."
languages.original_text: "Now that I've seen the great sacred statue of the Emperor, I only have one wish left. To set foot on the shrine world of Amalikeh that lies somewhere in the Cinerus Maleficum."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un ulu, kutsal heykelini görmüş oldum böylece, artık geriye tek bir arzum kaldı: Cinerus Maleficum'da bir yerlerde bulunan tapınak dünyası Amalikeh'ye ayak baskmak."
